If the recent Internet censorship bill is aloud in place then it will not do what it says it will not  affect child molestors or pedophiles in anyway no one that abuses children for child porn uses google it should not be on the Internet we stop them but out in the streets this bill than also makes family's "opt in to porn" means that more family's will be arguing more people will be embarrassed into not opting in. if the government can censor one part of the Internet what does this mean for the rest of the Internet?

If they can take one freedom away from the people how many can they take?
